options.content:
# Welcome to our ASSUME demo

This is the Grafana Dashboard which makes interacting with the simulation data very easy.

*IMPORTANT NOTE:* Grafana uses automated aggregation of data into time buckets with large time horizons displayed, e.g. time horizon > 1 month. It will display the average of the selected metric in the time bucket which underestimates the variance of the data and smoothes it.

# Market-specific Data

Data specific for the market depending on the choice made at te top of the panel

panels.description: Overview of market results for the chossen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(product_start, $__interval),
  avg(demand_volume) AS "Demand volume",
  avg(supply_volume) AS "Supply volume",
  avg(price) AS "Price",
  node
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$simulation') AND "market_id" ='$market' AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY 1, market_id, simulation, node
ORDER BY 1, node;

panels.title: Market Summary $market

panels.description: Big Point Size is demand match. Unused generation after that point

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  
  sum(volume::float) OVER (PARTITION BY market_id ORDER BY price asc, unit_id) AS "Volume",
  price::float AS "Price", unit_id,
  1/(volume - accepted_volume +1)/2 as size
  --'rgba(255,255,255,1)' as delta
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  
  start_time = (select min(start_time) from market_orders where market_id = '$market' AND
      simulation = '$simulation' and $__timeFilter(start_time))
  AND
  volume > 0 AND
  --accepted_volume != 0 AND
  market_id = '$market' AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY unit_id, volume, accepted_volume, price, market_id --, bid_id
ORDER BY price asc

--

SELECT
  -sum(volume::float) OVER (PARTITION BY market_id ORDER BY accepted_price asc, unit_id) AS "Volume",
  accepted_price::float AS "Price", unit_id,
  10 as size
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  
  start_time = (select min(start_time) from market_orders where market_id = '$market' AND
  simulation = '$simulation' and $__timeFilter(start_time))
  AND
  volume < 0 AND
  --accepted_volume != 0 AND
  market_id = '$market' AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY unit_id, volume, accepted_volume, accepted_price, market_id --, bid_id
ORDER BY accepted_price asc

--

panels.title: Merit Order $market at $min_time

targets.rawSql:
select time, sum(volume) as "volume", tech FROM 
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_volume) AS "volume", unit_id, pm.technology as tech
FROM market_orders mo
join power_plant_meta pm on pm.index=mo.unit_id and pm.simulation=mo.simulation
WHERE

  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  market_id = '$market' AND
  mo.simulation = '$simulation'

GROUP BY 1, unit_id, bid_id, pm.technology
ORDER BY 1

) a
group by 1, tech
ORDER BY 1, tech desc

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_price::float) AS "Price", unit_id
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  market_id = '$market' AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id --, bid_id
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Average Accepted Bid Price

panels.description: Accepted Volume  per unit in chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_volume) AS "Volume", unit_id
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  market_id = '$market' AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, bid_id
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Average Accepted Bid Volume

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  simulation,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_cost') as "Total cost",
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_volume') as "Total volume"
FROM kpis
WHERE simulation = '$simulation'
group by simulation

SELECT
  simulation,
  avg(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'avg_price') as avg_price,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2))  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_cost') as total_cost,
  sum(round(CAST(value AS numeric), 2)*1000)  FILTER (WHERE variable = 'total_volume') as total_volume
FROM kpis
group by simulation
ORDER BY simulation

panels.description: Shows installed capacities in the simulation based on the fuel type

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  NOW() as time_sec,
  SUM(max_power),
  technology
FROM power_plant_meta
WHERE "simulation" LIKE '$simulation'
GROUP BY technology, simulation;

panels.title: Installed Generation Capacities

targets.rawSql:
WITH ranked_prices AS (
    SELECT
        price, 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY price DESC) AS ranking,
        COUNT(*) OVER () AS total_hours
    FROM market_meta
    WHERE simulation = '$simulation' and market_id = '$market'
)
SELECT 
    (ranking::float / total_hours) AS percentage_of_time, 
    price
FROM ranked_prices
 
ORDER BY percentage_of_time;

options.content:
# Unit Specific Data

For the chosen market and the chosen unit here the dispatch is displayed.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "Market dispatch",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit"
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  avg(power) AS "Actual dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit
ORDER BY 1

options.content:
### General Information Name: {{index}}
Technology: {{technology}}
### Technical Specifications Emissions: {{emission_factor}} t/MWh
Maximum Power: {{max_power}} MW
Minimum Power: {{min_power}} MW
Efficiency: {{efficiency}}
##### Unit Operator: {{unit_operator}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM power_plant_meta
WHERE index in ($Gen_Units) and simulation = '$simulation'

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_price::float) AS "Accepted price:",
  avg(price) AS "Bid price:",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  price AS "Bid price:",
  unit_id as "unit_id",
  bid_id as "bid_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id, price, bid_id
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Bid Prices

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_volume) AS "Accepted volume:",
  avg(volume) AS "Bid volume:",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  volume AS "Bid volume:",
  unit_id as "unit_id",
  bid_id as "bid_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Gen_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id, volume, bid_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  energy_cashflow AS "Cashflow",
  energy_generation_costs AS "Production costs",
  energy_cashflow - energy_generation_costs AS "Profit",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, energy_cashflow, energy_generation_costs
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  energy_cashflow AS "Cashflow",
  energy_generation_costs AS "Production costs",
  energy_cashflow - energy_generation_costs AS "Profit",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Gen_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, energy_cashflow, energy_generation_costs
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "Market dispatch",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as unit
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit_id in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  power AS "Actual dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1

### General Information Name: {{index}}
Technology: {{technology}}
### Technical Specifications Emissions: {{emission_factor}} t/MWh
Maximum Power: {{max_power}} MW

##### Unit Operator: {{unit_operator}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM demand_meta
WHERE index in ($Demand_Units) and simulation = '$simulation'

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_price::float) AS "Accepted price:",
  avg(price) AS "Bid price:",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Demand_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id, price
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Bid Prices

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  -energy_cashflow AS "Cashflow",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch d
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  d.simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, energy_cashflow, power
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  -avg(accepted_volume) AS "Accepted volume:",
  -avg(volume) AS "Bid volume:",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Demand_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  sum(energy_cashflow)/sum(power) as "Price per MW",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch d
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  d.simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY unit
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: weighted average Price in €/MW for Demand $Demand_Units

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  -power*1e3 as "Volume",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch d
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  d.simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, energy_cashflow, power
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  -energy_cashflow AS "Cashflow:",
  -energy_generation_costs AS "Production costs:",
  energy_cashflow - energy_generation_costs AS "Profit",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Demand_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, energy_cashflow, energy_generation_costs
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datetime,$__interval),
  power AS "Market dispatch",
  unit_id,
  market_id
FROM market_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datetime) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, power, market_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  power AS "Actual dispatch",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, power
ORDER BY 1

options.content:
### General Information Name: {{index}}
Technology: {{technology}}
Unit Operator: {{unit_operator}} ### Technical Specifications Capacity: {{capacity}} MWh
Maximum State of Charge: {{max_soc}}
Minimum State of Charge: {{min_soc}}
Maximum Power Discharge: {{max_power_discharge}} MW
Minimum Power Discharge: {{min_power_discharge}} MW
Efficiency Discharge: {{efficiency_discharge}}
Maximum Power Charge: {{max_power_charge}} MW
Minimum Power Charge: {{min_power_charge}} MW
Efficiency Charge: {{efficiency_charge}} %
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM storage_meta
WHERE index in ($Storage_Units) and simulation = '$simulation'

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  SOC AS "State of Charge",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, SOC
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Bid prices of accepted bids per unit in the chosen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  CASE WHEN avg(accepted_volume) >= 0 THEN avg(accepted_price::float) END AS "Accepted price Discharge",
  CASE WHEN avg(accepted_volume) < 0 THEN avg(accepted_price::float) END AS "Accepted price Charge",
  CASE WHEN avg(volume) >= 0 THEN avg(price) END AS "Bid price Discharge",
  CASE WHEN avg(volume) < 0 THEN avg(price) END AS "Bid price Charge",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Bid Prices

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(accepted_volume) AS "Accepted volume:",
  CASE WHEN avg(volume) < 0 THEN avg(volume) END AS "Bid volume charge:",
  CASE WHEN avg(volume) >= 0 THEN avg(volume) END AS "Bid volume discharge:",
  concat(unit_id, ' - ', market_id) as "unit_id"
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id, market_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  avg(volume) AS "Bid volume:",
  unit_id
FROM market_orders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  unit_id in ($Storage_Units) AND
  simulation = '$simulation'
GROUP BY 1, unit_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  energy_cashflow AS "Cashflow",
  energy_generation_costs AS "Production costs",
  energy_cashflow - energy_generation_costs AS "Profit",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, energy_cashflow, energy_generation_costs
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  energy_cashflow AS "Cashflow",
  energy_generation_costs AS "Production costs",
  energy_cashflow - energy_generation_costs AS "Profit",
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  simulation = '$simulation' AND
  unit in ($Storage_Units)
GROUP BY 1, unit, energy_cashflow, energy_generation_costs
ORDER BY 1

list.description: Can choose which simulation we want to show
list.name: simulation

list.definition:
SELECT 
  market_id
FROM market_meta
where simulation='$simulation'
group by market_id ;
list.description: Choose for which market the data is displayed
list.name: market
list.query:
SELECT 
  market_id
FROM market_meta
where simulation='$simulation'
group by market_id ;

list.description: Can choose which units we want to display
list.name: Gen_Units

list.description: Can choose which units we want to display
list.name: Demand_Units

list.description: Can choose which storage units we want to display
list.name: Storage_Units

list.definition:
select min(start_time)::text from market_orders where market_id = '$market' AND
      simulation = '$simulation' and $__timeFilter(start_time)
list.description:
The minimum time we have in the time range.
Used for the merit order plot title
list.name: min_time
list.query:
select min(start_time)::text from market_orders where market_id = '$market' AND
      simulation = '$simulation' and $__timeFilter(start_time)
